Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-35945 affecting package nodejs18 for versions less than 18.17.1-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-35945 affecting package nodejs18 for versions less than 18.17.1-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package nodejs18 is earlier than 18.17.1-2, affected by CVE-2023-35945
